column4: Whats wicked is my logitech camera works in ubuntu now, it never worked before!
The only people who should be using 64 bit linux are people with more 4gb of memory and a quad core processor. 32 bit linux is fine up to 4gb and works better.
64 bit linux is a beautiful idea that is not quite ready yet.
what makes you say that, I run 64 bit on my laptop and desktop without problems now
